@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal @fcpsnews and why 1998? Is that the equivalent of 1967 $'s?
@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal @fcpsnews Numbers! But help me out. Are we deporting everyone who takes ESOL? What if only the parents do?
@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal @fcpsnews I'm sorry. Do you not have Internet where you are?
@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal @fcpsnews never said it was. But I was using source docs. You're just using a thesaurus.
@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal @fcpsnews But looking at the FCPS budget ESOL enrollment has been the same for five years. Massively the same
@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal @fcpsnews 'Massive' isn't a number I recognize. Normally we use Arabic numerals.
@ShallowGal @schooltyranny16 @fcpsnews is there a list of these effects or are we going by your feels? Seems kinda liberal
@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal @vdare True b/c we are the most adv. society in the world. As built by....immigrants.
@ShallowGal @schooltyranny16 @fcpsnews so is the problem immigration? Or reading comprehension? Sounds like the latter. That means #2.
@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal @fcpsnews immigration has only ever benefited the US. Starting with the Native Americans I guess.
@ShallowGal @schooltyranny16 @fcpsnews Colonization? This sounds familiar. Are you quoting an Iroquois chieftain from 1609?
@schooltyranny16 @jake_gold @ShallowGal and if they were Brown v. Education would never have happened. Thank you Founding Fathers!
@schooltyranny16 @jake_gold @ShallowGal there is probably a book at an FCPS library you could use to help you keep up.
@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal it's true @ShallowGal common sense lost in Bush v. Gore too.
@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal Christianity has survived a lot worse than a YA novel in a school library. Or is that its kryptonite?
@schooltyranny16 @ShallowGal aren't the schools filled with people? People who presumably are covered by the First Amendment? Sorry..PEOPLE!
@ShallowGal @schooltyranny16 The First Amendment can be so difficult like that. Prez-elect Snow--please repeal!
